channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Volkswagen’s Microbus-Style EV Will Not Come Back in 2026
item.description: Is it being paused, only to be quietly killed later on?

item.title: Game publisher says cheaper Switch 2 cartridges are coming in since-deleted post
item.description: Gamers who prefer physical copies of their favorite titles may be getting a major win with the Switch 2. In an unexpected announcement from retro video game publisher ININ Games, Nintendo reportedly has "two new smaller cartridge sizes" for its Switch 2 console. For ININ Games, these rumored game cartridges with smaller storage capacity allow the publisher to recalculate production costs and pursue a physical Switch 2 release of its upcoming R-Type Dimensions III. ININ Games later deleted its posts mentioning these smaller Switch 2 cartridges and issued a correction on its website and social m...

item.title: I hope I'm not getting ahead of myself — Resident Evil Requiem may end up being the best in the franchise, and here's why
item.description: With all that Capcom has showcased so far, I think Resident Evil Requiem looks poised to be the best entry the franchise has ever seen — here's why I think that.

item.title: Moteurs hybrides chinois dans les Mercedes, 380 000 km en Tesla et nos 4 voitures électriques préférées de 2025 – Récap’ Survoltés
item.description: Cette semaine sur Survoltés, le monde automobile s’agite entre décisions politiques européennes, innovations technologiques et percées chinoises. De l’assouplissement controversé de la réglementation thermique en Europe à l’arrivée de moteurs chinois dans les modèles allemands, en passant par un feu arrière ingénieux pour cyclistes ou encore les promesses d’autonomie record à bord d'une Tesla bien rôdée. ...

item.title: Sony’s XM5 headphones and the latest Kindle round out this week’s best deals
item.description: If you’re feeling the stress of having procrastinated on your holiday shopping — and you missed out during Black Friday and Cyber Monday — we’ve got you. We’ve found a variety of gadgets on sale that make for great gifts, many of which will ship in time for the holidays. One of the standouts is […]

item.title: New York Governor Kathy Hochul signs RAISE Act to regulate AI safety
item.description: The bill will require large AI developers to publish information about their safety protocols and report safety incidents to the state within 72 hours.

item.title: 25 best last-minute gifts at Amazon UK for under £50 that arrive before Christmas
item.description: Still desperately searching for a last-minute gift idea? I've rounded up 25 top tech items and cheap gadgets in Amazon's final sale before Christmas.

item.title: Appel à tous les sportifs : le Shokz OpenMove à conduction osseuse perd presque 30 % chez Amazon
item.description: Le Shokz OpenMove se présente avec un design particulier puisqu'il dispose d'une conduction osseuse parfaite pour les sportifs. Chez Amazon, il passe de 89,95 euros à 64 euros.

item.title: Comparatif : les meilleurs casques audio pas chers (à moins de 100 €)
item.description: Si la plupart des casques audio sans-fil sont assez coûteux, il existe tout de même de bons produits à moins de 100 euros. Voici notre sélection des meilleurs casques pas chers en 2025.

item.title: Newegg just made the Core Ultra 7 265K the fastest CPU under $300 - with a free Battlefield 6 game
item.description: There is no faster CPU under $300: Core Ultra 7 265K drops to $299.99 with free Battlefield 6 game.

item.title: Protect your holiday season with big ESET discount – 30% discounts across Essential, Premium, and Ultimate plans
item.description: I’ve rounded up ESET deals on Essentials, Premium, and Ultimate.

item.title: Nebula Awards Yelled at Until They Completely Ban Use of AI by Nominees
item.description: GenAI and LLMs almost got a soft pass to enter the Nebula Awards, but the sci-fi/fantasy writing community shut that down.

item.title: An exploded Starlink satellite is orbiting Earth right now
item.description: Following a successful launch of 27 new satellites, SpaceX loses one in minor explosion.

item.title: 6 new 4K Blu-rays from December 2025 to add to your collection
item.description: Just in time for the holidays, we take a look at new 4K discs we recommend adding to your 4K Blu-ray collection – or giving as gifts.

item.title: A new Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 8 leak may have revealed the chipset it's going to run on
item.description: There are fresh reports that the upcoming flip foldable is going to use one of Samsung's own chips.
